_source.text: 2 January 2013 Last updated at 03:25 GMT Share this page Delicious Digg Facebook reddit StumbleUpon Twitter Email Print Singapore growth beats estimates as it avoids recession Singapore's manufacturing sector has been hurt by slowing global demand Continue reading the main story Related Stories Singapore's start-ups seek success Singapore firms rethink strategy Watch Singapore: Economic slowdown opens foreign labour debate Singapore's economy has averted a technical recession, as it reported better-than-expected growth data for the fourth quarter.
